A Saudi citizen revealed his discovery of a unique tree that has distinctive properties, as it works to repel mosquitoes and has proven effective as a diabetes reducer when grown in homes. The citizen explained that his experience in planting this tree known as “neem” was successful in the capital, Riyadh. The neem tree is unique. It works as an effective mosquito repellent, making it an ideal choice for home cultivation to help limit the spread of these annoying insects. In addition, neem leaves carry additional benefits as they are used as a diabetes reducer. The leaves of this tree are a divine miracle!!? The neem tree, also known as “neem”, is considered one of the natural plants with many health and environmental benefits. Here are some important benefits of the neem tree: Insect repellent: Neem is considered one of the best natural means of repelling harmful insects. Neem extracts are used in making natural insecticides that help in reducing From the spread of mosquitoes, flies, cockroaches, etc. Reduced for diabetes: Some research has indicated that using neem extracts can help reduce blood sugar levels, making it beneficial for people suffering from diabetes. Anti-inflammatory: Neem contains substances that help reduce swelling and inflammation in the body. Therefore, it can be used as a natural treatment for diseases that are associated with inflammation.
Skin purification:
Neem is used in skin care products because it has cleansing and purifying properties. Neem extracts can be used to treat skin problems such as acne and wounds. Strengthening Hair: Neem is believed to promote scalp health and help reduce hair loss and improve hair growth. Environmental protection: The neem tree is considered a resistant and hardy plant, thus helping in preserving biodiversity and reducing environmental degradation.
Use in physical therapy:
Neem is used in folk medicine as a treatment for a variety of diseases and health disorders. These are some of the main benefits of the neem tree, and there are more uses and benefits that distinguish this distinctive plant.
